block.p: COHEN-Esther. Park East Synagogue mourns the passing of Esther Cohen, beloved Mother of our devoted Member and leader of Sisterhood, Maguy and Dr. Simon Naparstek. Sincere condolences to the entire family. Rabbi Arthur Schneier Michael Scharf, President Jerry Forst, Vice President Jack Rosen, Vice President

COHEN-Esther. Sisterhood of Park East Synagogue mourns the passing in Israel of the beloved Mother of our devoted Vice President Maguy Naparstek. Heartfelt condolences to all members of the bereaved family. Beverly Greenberg, President Polly Etkind Hochberg, Chairman of the Board
